Templates

Many elements in the Egyptian Gazette were produced using boilerplates. This page’s database contains a complete set of these elements. Use the images and links to text below, or consult the separate directories of XML files and image files. Copy and paste for standard-format elements, then fill in the details that change from issue to issue.

List of Templates

  • Alexandria General Produce Association
  • Arrivages a Minet-el-Bassal
  • Association des Courtiers en Marchandises
  • Association des Courtiers en Marchandises (Service Special)
  • Bourse Khediviale
  • Bulletin de la Bourse
  • Calendar of Coming Events
  • Calendar of the Week
  • Cereal Market
  • Cheap Prepaid Advertisements
  • Claims against the Estate
  • Coals
  • Coton
  • Cotons
  • Daily Weather Report
  • Delta Light Railways Ltd
  • Derniere Heure
  • Eastern Telegraph Co. Ltd.
  • Egyptian Gazette en vente
  • Egyptian Gazette Publishing information
  • Egyptian Gazette Subscriptions and Advertisements
  • Egyptian Markets, Limited
  • Egyptian Mining Market
  • Export Manifests
  • Exterieur
  • London Stock Exchange
  • Marche de Minet el Bassal
  • Mouvement Maritime
  • Municipalite Avis
  • Nile Gauge Readings
  • Nolis
  • Primes des Contrats
  • Ramleh Railway Co, Alexandria Tramway Co
  • Reuter’s Telegrams
  • Resume de la Situation Cotonniere
  • Share list
  • Stocks and Shares
  • Tarif d’Exportation
  • Telegrammes Havas
  • To-day’s Exchange quotations
  • Vade Mecum for the Homeward Bound
  • Weekly Postal Table

Alexandria General Produce Association

xml:id=”deg-el-agpa01” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-agpa01”

Arrivages a Minet-el-Bassal

xml:id=”deg-el-ameb01” This element seems to be largely repeated from issue to issue, but to change from month to month. xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-ameb01”

Association des Courtiers en Marchandises

xml:id=”deg-el-adcm01” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-adcm01”

Association des Courtiers en Marchandises (Service Special)

xml:id=”deg-el-acms01” xml text

Bourse Khediviale

xml:id=”deg-el-bokh01” xml text

See also variant (prepared by Brett Crawford): xml:id=”deg-el-clbk01” xml text

Bulletin de la Bourse

element=”bulletinBourse”

Calendar of Coming Events

element=”comingEvents” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-coce01”

Calendar of the Week

xml:id=”deg-el-cotw01” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-cotw01”

Cereal Market

xml:id=”deg-el-cema01” At least one of the “Cereals in Boat” items changes from issue to issue: Barley Mariuti changes to Barley Shami. Keep an eye out for other changes. xml text tables xml:id=”deg-ta-cema01” xml:id=”deg-ta-cema02”

Cheap Prepaid Advertisements

element=”prepaidAdvertisements” xml text

Add each advertisement as a <div type="item"> within the section.

Claims against the Estate

xml:id=”deg-el-caet01” This element contains consistent text around changing names and details. xml text

Coals

xml:id=”deg-el-coal01” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-coal01”

Coton

xml:id=”deg-el-cotn01” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-cotn01”

Cotons

xml:id=”deg-el-ctns01” xml text tables xml:id=”deg-ta-ctns01”, xml:id=”deg-ta-ctns02”

Daily Weather Report

xml:id=”deg-el-dawr01” xml text tables xml:id=”deg-ta-dawr01” xml:id=”deg-ta-dawr02” xml:id=”deg-ta-dawr03” xml:id=”deg-ta-dawr04”

Delta Light Railways Ltd

xml:id=”deg-el-dllr01” xml text tables xml:id=”deg-ta-dllr01”, xml:id=”deg-ta-dllr02”

Derniere Heure

xml:id=”deg-el-dehe1” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-dehe1”

Eastern Telegraph Co. Ltd.

xml:id=”deg-el-etcl1” xml text Be sure to change date (including <date when="">) in opening lines. table xml:id=”deg-ta-etcl1”

Egyptian Gazette en vente

xml:id=”deg-el-egev01” xml text.

Egyptian Gazette Publishing information

xml:id=”deg-el-egpi01” xml text

Egyptian Gazette Subscriptions and Advertisements

xml:id=”deg-el-egsa01” xml text

xml:id=”deg-el-egsa02” xml text

Egyptian Markets, Limited

xml:id=”deg-el-egml01” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-egml01”

Egyptian Mining Market

xml:id=”deg-el-egmm01” It seems that the figures in this table are identical in some consecutive issues. Table xml:id=”deg-ta-egmm01”

xml text

Export Manifests

element=”exportManifests” This list is unique in each issue. Tag placenames and dates, and break out the number and unit of exported commodities in the table. table xml:id=”deg-ta-exma01”

xml text

Exterieur

xml:id=”deg-el-extr01” xml text

London Stock Exchange

xml:id=”deg-el-lsex01” xml text table xml:id=”deg-ta-lsex01”

Marche de Minet el Bassal

xml:id=”deg-el-mmeb01” xml text Tables xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb01” xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb02” xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb03” xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb04” xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb05” xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb06” xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb07” xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb08” xml:id=”deg-ta-mmeb09”

The first table is sometimes empty (sans changement). In this case, use this xml template. “Exportations probable de la semaine” is sometimes absent.

Mouvement Maritime

element=”mouvementMaritime” This model xml text doesn’t contain much useful formatting, but it shows that places, persons, dates, and tonnage should be tagged.

Municipalite Avis

xml:id=”deg-el-maav01” This model xml text call for tenders varies according to the construction project and dates.

Nile Gauge Readings

xml:id=”deg-el-nile01” xml text This is a cumulative monthly table. Each day, a new line is added to the existing table. It is thus useful to work back from a copy of the end of the month’s table. Table xml:id=”deg-ta-nile01”

Nolis

xml:id=”deg-el-noli01” xml text Table xml:id=”deg-ta-noli01”

Primes des Contrats

xml:id=”deg-el-pdco01” It seems that the figures in this table are identical in some consecutive issues.

xml text Table xml:id=”deg-ta-pdco01”

Ramleh Railway Co, Alexandria Tramway Co

xml:id=”deg-el-rrat01” xml text Tables xml:id=”deg-ta-rrat01”, xml:id=”deg-ta-rrat02”

Reuter’s Telegrams

xml:id=”deg-el-reut01” xml text This table varies in lines from day to day. Certain days of the week contain weekly summaries. The template contains most possible lines–merely delete those lines that do not appear. Table xml:id=”deg-ta-reut01”

Resume de la Situation Cotonniere

xml:id=”deg-el-rsco01” xml text

Share list

xml:id=”deg-el-shli01” xml text Table xml:id=”deg-ta-shli01”

Stocks and Shares

xml:id=”deg-el-stsh01” xml text Table xml:id=”deg-ta-stsh01”

Tarif d’Exportation

xml:id=”deg-el-tdex01” xml text Table xml:id=”deg-ta-tdex01”

Telegrammes Havas

xml:id=”deg-el-teha01” xml text Table xml:id=”deg-ta-teha01”

To-day’s Exchange quotations

xml:id=”deg-el-tdeq01” xml text Table xml:id=”deg-ta-tdeq01”

This element often contains only a few changes from day to day.

Vade Mecum for the Homeward Bound

xml:id=”deg-el-vmhb01” xml text This example is from December 5, 1905. Variations to be determined.

Weekly Postal Table

xml:id=”deg-el-wept01” xml text (produced by John White) Table xml:id=”deg-ta-wept01”
